level.heading: Transfer of real property pursuant to Legally Binding Agreement.
level.text: Notwithstanding Chapter 8 of this title [ยง 10-801 et seq.], the Mayor is authorized to transfer the subject real property to the applicable homeless-assistance provider in accordance with the terms of the applicable Legally Binding Agreement.

level.heading: Emergency Legislation
level.text: For temporary addition of section, see ยง 5 of the Walter Reed Army Medical Center Base Realignment and Closure Homeless Assistance Submission Congressional Review Emergency Approval Act of 2012 (D.C. Act 19-528, November 2, 2012, 59 DCR 13325), applicable as of October 16, 2012.
